EmailTemplate.name: One Time Oval Request - Positive Answer
EmailTemplate.subject: Request for using the DuPont Oval Logo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.LastName},
Further to a request received from your company, we provide you with our approval to use the DuPont Oval for the duration of the [insert event name]. This limited approval does not grant {!Lead.Company} under no circumstances whatsoever the rights to use the DuPont Oval logo for in any other form besides the above mentioned event.
Please find attached the logo in tif-format and the DuPont Oval Trademark Use Rules.
Please also note that any lay-out or communication using the DuPont Oval logo for the event is subject to prior agreement of the Marketing & Brand Leader, DuPont EMEA, Ruth Farrell (e-mail: emea.marketing@che.dupont.com, fax: +41 22 580 2639)
Kind regards,
{!Lead.OwnerFullName} Marketing & Brand Project Lead DuPont EMEA
